verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> and <S%H7892>Song<s%> at the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I will <S%H7311>extol<s%> you, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for you have <S%H1802>lifted<s%> me up, and have not made my <S%H341>foes<s%> to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over me.
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H7768>cried<s%> to you, and you have <S%H7495>healed<s%> me.

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you have <S%H5927>brought<s%> up my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7585>grave:<s%> you have kept me <S%H2421>alive,<s%> that I should not <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O you <S%H2623>saints<s%> of his, and give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> at the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of his <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>

For his <S%H639>anger<s%> endures but a <S%H7281>moment;<s%> in his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is <S%H2416>life:<s%> <S%H1065>weeping<s%> may <S%H3885>endure<s%> for a <S%H6153>night,<s%> but <S%H7440>joy<s%> comes in the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
And in my <S%H7961>prosperity<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> I shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>

<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> by your <S%H7522>favor<s%> you have made my <S%H2042>mountain<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5797>strong:<s%> you did <S%H5641>hide<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and I was <S%H926>troubled.<s%>
I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to you, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> I made <S%H2603>supplication.<s%>

<S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H1215>profit<s%> is there in my <S%H1818>blood,<s%> when I <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit?<s%> Shall the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> you? shall it <S%H5046>declare<s%> your <S%H571>truth?<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on me: <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> be you my <S%H5826>helper.<s%>
You have <S%H2015>turned<s%> for me my <S%H4553>mourning<s%> into <S%H4234>dancing:<s%> you have <S%H6605>put<s%> off my <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H8057>gladness;<s%>

To the <S%H4616>end<s%> that my <S%H3519>glory<s%> may <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to you, and not be <S%H1826>silent.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to you for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
